img.h1:
Ketterer Charter School’s niche is providing positive academic,
behavioral and therapeutic support in a nurturing environment for
students who have struggled in a traditional school setting.

Ketterer Charter School is a School-wide Title I A building.
The primary goal of Title I is to ensure that all students,
particularly those who are low achieving, demonstrate
proficient and advanced levels of achievement on state
academic standards.

div.class: bd-row row-0 n-3 lv-1 first row clearfix
builder-column col-lg-4 col-md-4 col-sm-4 four index-1 first

div.p: The Adelphoi Promise Program was created to provide hope and a brighter future for Adelphoi students.

div.class: builder-column col-lg-4 col-md-4 col-sm-4 four index-2

div.p: Academic and vocational components that develop PACTT employability skills and career exploration.

div.class: builder-column col-lg-4 col-md-4 col-sm-4 four index-3 last

div.p: Provide support for the academic, behavioral and social growth and development of all students.

div.class: bd-row row-1 n-3 lv-1 row clearfix
builder-column col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-sm-12 twelve index-1 last first
bd-row row-0 n-2 lv-2 first clearfix
bd-row row-1 n-2 lv-2 last clearfix

p.strong:
Support Staff and all teachers will be available for instructional support hours daily (Monday-Friday) from 9:00-11:00 am and
12:00-3:00 pm
RKCS Letter Regarding Planned Distance Instruction Beginning 3/30/20, including teacher contacts-VIEW
Parent/Caregiver Guide to Helping Families Cope with the Coronavirus-COVID-19-VIEW
Important Message regarding the Coronavirus, COVID-19, March 12, 2020-VIEW
Keystone Info. for Parents & Guardians from the PA Dept. of Education –

div.p:
Free Meals for Children in the Summer
The Summer Food Service Program (SFSP) offers free, nutritious meals to children 18 years and younger during the summer when school is not in session. SFSP is a federal child nutrition program. There are approximately 2500 locations throughout Pennsylvania that serve breakfast, lunch and/or snacks. Many of the locations provide activities as well.

How to find a SFSP location near you:
–Call: 211 or 1.866.3HUNGRY or 1.877.8HAMBRE
–Text: “Food” or “COMIDA” to 877877
–Download: RangeAPP.org mobile app
–Visit:fns.usda.gov/summerfoodrocks
